Articles.Content:
Yep, release IMMINENT!

- - - Updated - - -

Still curious what the Geoguessur countdown is all about though.
I wonder who is going to get the legendary 1st post on both page 300, and release! Probably not me, because I'm playing ASAP!!

> 
> Looks like squad is performing a server migration directly before release.

"Sorry, the server migration failed, and for some reason our supplier deleted the backups of the old servers - we've got to start again....." 

(insert the sounds of screams echoing across the globe)

"Only kidding... HYPE!!" ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
I still think that the Inline cockpit should have had darker windows and the bit behind the windows should have still been windows.

> 
> I still think that the Inline cockpit should have had darker windows and the bit behind the windows should have still been windows.

Does this somehow make you hyped? We are in the final stretch here people!!!
Guys... what if... they only release once we reach a certain number of pages... ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)

> 
> Guys... what if... they only release once we reach a certain number of pages... ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)

Better aim for page 500 just to be sure.

> 
> Guys... what if... they only release once we reach a certain number of pages... ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)

Squad wouldn't wait on the HypeTrain.

AMA starting in 15 minutes!

[http://www.reddit.com/r/IAmA/comments/33ys4s/we_are_the_team_behind_kerbal_space_program/](http://www.reddit.com/r/IAmA/comments/33ys4s/we_are_the_team_behind_kerbal_space_program/)
Let's get to 200

> 
> Let's get to 200

Keep cranking out the hype!
Hey guys, I've got some Hypecoal to throw in, I heard they're adding an asteroid ring around Dres.

> 
> Hey guys, I've got some Hypecoal to throw in, I heard they're adding an asteroid ring around Dres.

It's supposed to be a true asteroid belt. Hopefully.

> 
> Hey guys, I've got some Hypecoal to throw in, I heard they're adding an asteroid ring around Dres.

Woa seriously??? Source?
Any new planets or satellites going into this update? Or would that sort of thing be kept under wraps until launch?

It was some guy on twitch, from ksptv.

Edit: @Kylekov

> 
> Woa seriously??? Source?

The stream, asteroids now spawn in orbit around dres.
CLEGANEBOWL GET HY- wait, wrong thread...

> 
> Any new planets or satellites going into this update? Or would that sort of thing be kept under wraps until launch?

They have said there are some Easter eggs and that they are large. They also said it would take a month before anyone found it (which I am assuming is a joke)

Perfect music for the HypeTrain:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/vsR9nL0cJJU?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
 
Everyone needs to listen to that in loop, double speed, while waiting and watching this thread.

> 
> They have said there are some Easter eggs and that they are large. They also said it would take a month before anyone found it (which I am assuming is a joke)

The bet was two months actually, and I think theres only one new easter egg, not multiple.

> 
> Perfect music for the HypeTrain:
> [https://youtu.be/vsR9nL0cJJU](https://youtu.be/vsR9nL0cJJU)

I was thinking more

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/GPbqQOf41Qc?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
 ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> The bet was two months actually, and I think theres only one new easter egg, not multiple.

2 months is ridiculous right?

> 
> Any new planets or satellites going into this update? Or would that sort of thing be kept under wraps until launch?

No, none of the streams saw any, and one cycled through all of the bodies.

Devs have only mentioned one easter egg.

I have not found any yet.

Also : HYPE!

\*bunkers down with other moderators in preparation for massive influx of posts after release\*
